workflow_instructions.mode_overview: This mode automates the creation of Git branches and worktrees following conventions, suggesting types and names, executing commands, and opening the new environment in VS Code.

step.details: Present the user with options such as: feature, docs, refactor, fix, chore.
Combine the chosen type with the provided base name, suggesting three options in the format type/name.

step.action: Open the worktree in VS Code

completion_criteria.criterion: Worktree created and opened in VS Code
